main_text:
Extensions of Bradley’s Regress Arguments
2. Extensions of Bradley’s Regress Arguments

In the decades since Bradley’s original discussion in
AR, “Bradley’s regress” has come to refer
to a wider variety of arguments. This widening of scope has happened
in two main directions: (i) with respect to the ontology that the
arguments target; and (ii) with respect to the type of the argument
presented. In this section we will take a closer look at both of these
extensions.
hierarchy_title: Bradley’s Regress || Extensions of Bradley’s Regress Arguments
